external_games.name: Tabletopia - Scythe: The Wind Gambit + Invaders from Afar

name: Tabletopia: Scythe - The Wind Gambit + Invaders from Afar
summary: Scythe: The Wind Gambit adds 2 new modules that can be played together or separately at any player count and with either the base game or other Scythe expansions. Scythe: Invaders from Afar, an expansion for Scythe, adds two new factions: 10 miniatures, 62 custom wooden tokens, and 2 faction mats.
